summary: This bill, the Advancing Research on Agricultural Soil Health Act of 2025, mandates the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a standardized methodology for measuring soil carbon, provide technical assistance for voluntary reporting, and update the methodology to reflect the best available science. It also establishes a Soil Carbon Inventory and Analysis Network, funds on-farm demonstration trials, and requires the development of predictive models to assess land management practices' impact on carbon sequestration and greenhouse gas emissions. Appropriations are authorized for these initiatives.
